title: OrgDevice.Attributes
description: Attributes that describe an organization device resource.

addedToOrgDateTime.description: The date and time of adding the device to an organization.

orderDateTime.description: The date and time of placing the device’s order.

orderNumber.description: The order number of the device.

partNumber.description: The part number of the device.

productFamily.description: The device’s Apple product family: iPhone, iPad,Mac, AppleTV, Watch, or Vision

productType.description: The device’s product type: (examples: iPhone14,3, iPad13,4, MacBookPro14,2)

purchaseSourceId.description: The unique ID of the purchase source type: Apple Customer Number or Reseller Number

purchaseSourceType.description: The device’s purchase source type: APPLE, RESELLER, or MANUALLY_ADDED

status.description: The devices status: ASSIGNED or UNASSIGNED. If ASSIGNED, use a separate API to get the information of the assigned server.

updatedDateTime.description: The date and time of the most-recent update for the device.
